question: Can i copy some of your information from web page?
answer:
QUESTION
I'm making a web page on Islamic information but I need some information regarding islam, so yesterday when i was surfing on internet i came up with this site islam.tc. so, i just want to ask you that if it's ok that if i could copy some of the information from this site and put it on my web page, like some duas, Quran, and Islamic articles.
ANSWER


Share:
Articles that appear on our websites may be used
with the proviso that;
· It is acknowledged
· Should not be edited.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
